column5: Don't know if this affects us in Canada, but in the US a recall of certain boat trailers was issued... http://www-odi.nhtsa.dot.gov/cars/problems...PrintVersion=NO
Yikes!  Wayne, did your Lund come on an EZ-Loader made in 2006?  The swing-tongue part of the trailer is listed as a recall...  Tony
Hell no Tony! Shorelander all the way....
Hehe, I'm probably going to go Galvanized EZ-Loader with the dual axle.
Thanks for the heads up.It turns out my trailer is on the recall list.Thanks again .Dan
No fun having a trailer pass you on the right! Check it out good Dan.
I called EZ loader and the parts are on their way.If it hadnt been for Ricks post that could have happened Wayne.Or worse like a roll over.
Many of those trailers are made right here in Lindsay. If anyone is having problems getting the parts or support, let me know, I use to work there. Still know most of the fellows!
